name: IS_VALID_SEGMENT_VALUE
body_snippet:
FUNCTION IS_VALID_SEGMENT_VALUE(STRCT NUMBER,SEG NUMBER,VAL VARCHAR2) RETURN NUMBER IS

--------------------------------------------------------
-----THIS FUNCTION VALIDATES A GIVEN CODE IN DATABASE 
-----
----- THIS FUNCTION RETURN A NUMBER TYPE WHICH CAN BE ONE OF THE FOLLOWING
------
------ RETURNS  0 IF THE CODE IS VALID
------ RETURNS -1 IF ANY OF THE SEGMENTS DOESN'T EXISTS 
------ RETURNS -2 IF ANY OF THE SEGMENT VALUE DOESN'T EXISTS
------ RETURNS -3 IF ANY OF THE SEGMENT VALUE IS PARENT 
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------
				


TMP NUMBER:=0;
RET NUMBER:=0;

BEGIN

	IF SEG = 1 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT01
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
	ELSIF SEG=2 THEN        
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT02
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
	ELSIF SEG=3 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT03
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
	ELSIF SEG=4 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT04
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
		
	ELSIF SEG=5 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT05
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
		
	ELSIF SEG=6 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FROM WIZ_SEGMENT06
		WHERE SEGMENT_VALUE=VAL AND
					STRUCTURE_ID =STRCT;
		
	ELSIF SEG=7 THEN
		SELECT PARENT_YN INTO TMP 
		FR
